sqlMap.statement: LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayBscGprsSpaceUsers ( intBscId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP ,nmLocalUsers) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDaySgsnGprsSpaceUsers ( intSgsnId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP ,nmLocalUsers) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayStreetGprsSpaceUsers ( intStreetId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP ,nmLocalUsers) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDaySaleAreaGprsSpaceUsers ( intSaleAreaId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP ,nmLocalUsers) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayCompanyGprsSpaceUsers ( intBranchId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP ,nmLocalUsers) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayBscBussTypeUsers ( intBscId,nmBussinessId,nmBussinessTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDaySgsnBussTypeUsers ( intSgsnId,nmBussinessId,nmBussinessTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayStreetBussTypeUsers ( intStreetId,nmBussinessId,nmBussinessTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDaySaleAreaBussTypeUsers ( intSaleAreaId,nmBussinessId,nmBussinessTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayCompanyBussTypeUsers ( intBranchId,nmBussinessId,nmBussinessTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayGprsBussTypeUsers ( nmBussinessTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayApnUsers ( intApnId,intApnTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayApnTypeUsers ( intApnTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayTcpProtocolUsers ( intProtocolTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayWapProtocolUsers ( intWapId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayUserBelongUsers ( intUserBelongId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
update ftbStatDayCgiFlush set vccgi=REPLACE(vccgi, CHAR(10), '') where intYear=#intYear# and intMonth=#intMonth#
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayCgiFlush ( vcCGI,intYear,intMonth,intWeek,intDay, nmAppUpFlush,nmAppDownFlush,nmUsers,nmFlush,dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP ) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayApnBscUsers ( intBscId,intApnId,intApnTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayApnSgsnUsers ( intSgsnId,intApnId,intApnTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayApnStreetUsers ( intStreetId,intApnId,intApnTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayApnSaleAreaUsers ( intSaleAreaId,intApnId,intApnTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayApnCompanyUsers ( intBranchId,intApnId,intApnTypeId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayApnUserBelongUsers ( intUserBelongId,intApnTypeId,intApnId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayGprsBussUsers ( nmBussinessId, intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$

insert into ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush ( intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,nmLocalUsers) select #intYear#,#intMonth#,#intWeek#,#intDay#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(), count(distinct(case when intUserBelongId=1 then nmimsi else 0 end)) from $sourceTableName$ where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) and intDay = datepart(dd,#dtLoadedTime#)

insert into ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush ( intYear , intMonth , intWeek, intDay , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,nmLocalUsers) select #intYear#,#intMonth#,#intWeek#,#intDay#,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype, count(distinct(case when intUserBelongId=1 then nmimsi else 0 end)) from $sourceTableName$ where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) and intDay = datepart(dd,#dtLoadedTime#) group by intRaitype;
delete from ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) and intDay = datepart(dd,#dtLoadedTime#) and vcLocalIP is null

update ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush set nmAppUpFlush = (select sum(h.nmAppUpFlush) from ftbStatHourGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = h.intDay ), nmAppDownFlush = (select sum(h.nmAppDownFlush) from ftbStatHourGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = h.intDay), nmFlush =(select sum(h.nmFlush) from ftbStatHourGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = h.intDay ), nmLocalFlush =(select sum(h.nmLocalFlush) from ftbStatHourGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = h.intDay ) where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth =datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = datepart(dd,#dtLoadedTime#) ;

update ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush set nmAppUpFlush = (select sum(h.nmAppUpFlush) from ftbStatHourGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = h.intDay and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intRaitype = h.intRaitype ), nmAppDownFlush = (select sum(h.nmAppDownFlush) from ftbStatHourGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = h.intDay and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intRaitype = h.intRaitype ), nmFlush =(select sum(h.nmFlush) from ftbStatHourGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = h.intDay and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intRaitype = h.intRaitype ), nmLocalFlush =(select sum(h.nmLocalFlush) from ftbStatHourGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = h.intDay and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intRaitype = h.intRaitype ) where ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intMonth =datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) and ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush.intDay = datepart(dd,#dtLoadedTime#) ;
-- LOAD TABLE ftbStatDayGprsTotalFlush ( intYear,intMonth,intWeek,intDay,nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP ) $option$
